config: Knowing your teammates as people rather than just job roles fosters and builds team spirit, confidence, and trust. Read these little-known facts about our teammates and guess which person they belong to.
This person performed music around the world.
As a child, this person played soccer and won a regional championship in their first year.
This person likes to perform magic tricks at parties.
This person knows how to play six different musical instruments.
As a child, this person earned a black belt in karate.
We will share the correct answers tomorrow on Slack!
